title: Vintage Lemonade Tin Sign typeface
content:
Hi There,

I was wondering if anyone knew if there were any typefaces that looked like the the ones used on the vintage lemonade tin signs.

[http://onthebutton.files.wordpress.com/2009/10/fresh-lemonade.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20100209201545/http:/onthebutton.files.wordpress.com/2009/10/fresh-lemonade.jpg "http://onthebutton.files.wordpress.com/2009/10/fresh-lemonade.jpg")

[http://thumb2.visualizeus.com/thumbs/09/04/04/art,blue,color,colour,desi...](http://web.archive.org/web/20100209201545/http:/thumb2.visualizeus.com/thumbs/09/04/04/art,blue,color,colour,design,hiphop,illustration,lemonade,lyrics,mixed,media,poster,purple,raekwon,type,typography-8969eae8f5769c7c8d69b7ca8c8e420a_m.jpg "http://thumb2.visualizeus.com/thumbs/09/04/04/art,blue,color,colour,design,hiphop,illustration,lemonade,lyrics,mixed,media,poster,purple,raekwon,type,typography-8969eae8f5769c7c8d69b7ca8c8e420a\_m.jpg")

[http://ep.yimg.com/ca/I/candy-crate\_2091\_259528954](http://web.archive.org/web/20100209201545/http:/ep.yimg.com/ca/I/candy-crate_2091_259528954 "http://ep.yimg.com/ca/I/candy-crate\_2091\_259528954")

Thanks in advance.

Tom
author: TomBrierley

comments.content:
You might find something on [http://www.letterheadfonts.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20100209201545/http:/www.letterheadfonts.com/ "http://www.letterheadfonts.com/")  
They do some nice vintage looking fonts.

Hi Tom,  
Iâ€™ll move your request to the appropriate place, the [Type ID Board](http://web.archive.org/web/20100209201545/http:/typophile.com/typeid).  
F
